--- ## ç—›ç‚¹ ä½¿ç”¨çº¿ç¨‹æ±  ThreadPoolExecutor è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ä½ æ˜¯å¦æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹ç—›ç‚¹å‘¢ï¼Ÿ > 1. ä»£ç ä¸­åˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ª ThreadPoolExecutorï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸çŸ¥é“é‚£å‡ ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒå‚æ•°è®¾ç½®å¤šå°‘æ¯”è¾ƒåˆé€‚ > > 2. å‡­ç»éªŒè®¾ç½®å‚æ•°å€¼ï¼Œä¸Šçº¿åå‘ç°éœ€è¦è°ƒæ•´ï¼Œæ”¹ä»£ç é‡æ–°å‘å¸ƒæœåŠ¡ï¼Œéå¸¸éº»çƒ¦ > > 3. çº¿ç¨‹æ± ç›¸å¯¹å¼€å‘äººå‘˜æ¥è¯´æ˜¯ä¸ªé»‘ç›’ï¼Œè¿è¡Œæƒ…å†µä¸èƒ½åŠæ—¶æ„ŸçŸ¥åˆ°ï¼Œç›´åˆ°å‡ºç°é—®é¢˜ å¦‚æœæœ‰ä»¥ä¸Šç—›ç‚¹ï¼ŒåŠ¨æ€å¯ç›‘æ§çº¿ç¨‹æ± æ¡†æ¶ï¼ˆ**DynamicTp**ï¼‰æˆ–è®¸èƒ½å¸®åŠ©åˆ°ä½ ã€‚ å¦‚æœçœ‹è¿‡ ThreadPoolExecutor çš„æºç ï¼Œå¤§æ¦‚å¯ä»¥çŸ¥é“å®ƒå¯¹æ ¸å¿ƒå‚æ•°åŸºæœ¬éƒ½æœ‰æä¾› set / get æ–¹æ³•ä»¥åŠä¸€äº›æ‰©å±•æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶åŠ¨æ€ä¿®æ”¹ã€è·å–ç›¸åº”çš„å€¼ï¼Œè¿™äº›æ–¹æ³•æœ‰ï¼š ```java public void setCorePoolSize(int corePoolSize); public void setMaximumPoolSize(int maximumPoolSize); public void setKeepAliveTime(long time, TimeUnit unit); public void setThreadFactory(ThreadFactory threadFactory); public void setRejectedExecutionHandler(RejectedExecutionHandler handler); public void allowCoreThreadTimeOut(boolean value); public int getCorePoolSize(); public int getMaximumPoolSize(); public long getKeepAliveTime(TimeUnit unit); public BlockingQueue getQueue(); public RejectedExecutionHandler getRejectedExecutionHandler(); public boolean allowsCoreThreadTimeOut(); protected void beforeExecute(Thread t, Runnable r); protected void afterExecute(Runnable r, Throwable t); ``` ç°åœ¨å¤§å¤šæ•°çš„äº’è”ç½‘é¡¹ç›®éƒ½ä¼šé‡‡ç”¨å¾®æœåŠ¡åŒ–éƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸€å¥—è‡ªå·±çš„æœåŠ¡æ²»ç†ä½“ç³»ï¼Œå¾®æœåŠ¡ç»„ä»¶ä¸­çš„åˆ†å¸ƒå¼é…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒ æ‰®æ¼”çš„å°±æ˜¯åŠ¨æ€ä¿®æ”¹é…ç½®ï¼Œå®æ—¶ç”Ÿæ•ˆçš„è§’è‰²ã€‚ é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥ç»“åˆé…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒæ¥åšè¿è¡Œæ—¶çº¿ç¨‹æ± å‚æ•°çš„åŠ¨æ€è°ƒæ•´å‘¢ï¼Ÿ ç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯è‚¯å®šçš„ï¼Œè€Œä¸”é…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒç›¸å¯¹éƒ½æ˜¯é«˜å¯ç”¨çš„ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨å®ƒä¹Ÿä¸ç”¨è¿‡äºæ‹…å¿ƒé…ç½®æ¨é€å¤±è´¥è¿™ç±»é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè€Œä¸”ä¹Ÿèƒ½å‡å°‘ç ”å‘åŠ¨æ€çº¿ç¨‹æ± ç»„ä»¶æœ¬èº«çš„éš¾åº¦å’Œæ¥å…¥çš„å·¥ä½œé‡ã€‚ **ç»¼ä¸Šï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ€»ç»“å‡ºä»¥ä¸‹çš„èƒŒæ™¯** - **å¹¿æ³›æ€§**ï¼šåœ¨ Java å¼€å‘ä¸­ï¼Œæƒ³è¦æé«˜ç³»ç»Ÿæ€§èƒ½ï¼Œçº¿ç¨‹æ± å·²ç»æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª 90% ä»¥ä¸Šå¼€å‘äººå‘˜éƒ½ä¼šé€‰æ‹©ä½¿ç”¨çš„åŸºç¡€å·¥å…· - **ä¸ç¡®å®šæ€§**ï¼šé¡¹ç›®ä¸­å¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨å¾ˆå¤šçº¿ç¨‹æ± ï¼Œæ—¢æœ‰ IO å¯†é›†å‹çš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿæœ‰ CPU å¯†é›†å‹çš„ï¼Œä½†çº¿ç¨‹æ± çš„æ ¸å¿ƒå‚æ•°å¹¶ä¸å¥½ç¡®å®šï¼Œéœ€è¦æœ‰å¥—æœºåˆ¶åœ¨è¿è¡Œè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­åŠ¨æ€å»è°ƒæ•´å‚æ•° - **æ— æ„ŸçŸ¥æ€§**ï¼šçº¿ç¨‹æ± è¿è¡Œè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­çš„å„é¡¹æŒ‡æ ‡ä¸€èˆ¬æ„ŸçŸ¥ä¸åˆ°ï¼Œéœ€è¦æœ‰å¥—ç›‘æ§æŠ¥è­¦æœºåˆ¶åœ¨äº‹å‰ã€äº‹ä¸­å°±èƒ½è®©å¼€å‘äººå‘˜æ„ŸçŸ¥åˆ°çº¿ç¨‹æ± çš„è¿è¡ŒçŠ¶å†µï¼ŒåŠæ—¶å¤„ç† - **é«˜å¯ç”¨æ€§**ï¼šé…ç½®å˜æ›´éœ€è¦åŠæ—¶æ¨é€åˆ°å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼Œéœ€è¦æœ‰é«˜å¯ç”¨çš„é…ç½®ç®¡ç†æ¨é€æœåŠ¡ï¼Œé…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒæ˜¯ç°åœ¨å¤§å¤šæ•°äº’è”ç½‘ç³»ç»Ÿéƒ½ä¼šä½¿ç”¨çš„ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œä¸ä¹‹ç»“åˆå¯ä»¥æå¤§æé«˜ç³»ç»Ÿå¯ç”¨æ€§ --- ## åŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹æ€§ åŸºäºä»¥ä¸ŠèƒŒæ™¯åˆ†æï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹çº¿ç¨‹æ±  ThreadPoolExecutor åšä¸€äº›æ‰©å±•å¢å¼ºï¼Œä¸»è¦å®ç°ä»¥ä¸‹ç›®æ ‡ > 1. å®ç°å¯¹è¿è¡Œä¸­çº¿ç¨‹æ± å‚æ•°çš„åŠ¨æ€ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œå®æ—¶ç”Ÿæ•ˆ > > 2. å®æ—¶ç›‘æ§çº¿ç¨‹æ± çš„è¿è¡ŒçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œè§¦å‘è®¾ç½®çš„æŠ¥è­¦ç­–ç•¥æ—¶æŠ¥è­¦ï¼ŒæŠ¥è­¦ä¿¡æ¯æ¨é€åŠå…¬å¹³å° > > 3. å®šæ—¶é‡‡é›†çº¿ç¨‹æ± æŒ‡æ ‡æ•°æ®ï¼Œé…åˆåƒ Grafana è¿™ç§å¯è§†åŒ–ç›‘æ§å¹³å°åšå¤§ç›˜ç›‘æ§ > > 4. é›†æˆå¸¸ç”¨ä¸‰æ–¹ä¸­é—´ä»¶å†…éƒ¨çº¿ç¨‹æ± ç®¡ç† **ç»è¿‡å¤šä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬çš„è¿­ä»£ï¼Œç›®å‰æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬ v1.1.9.1 å…·æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹ç‰¹æ€§** âœ… - **ä»£ç é›¶ä¾µå…¥**ï¼šæˆ‘ä»¬æ”¹å˜äº†çº¿ç¨‹æ± ä»¥å¾€çš„ä½¿ç”¨å§¿åŠ¿ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰é…ç½®å‡æ”¾åœ¨é…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒï¼ŒæœåŠ¡å¯åŠ¨æ—¶ä¼šä»é…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒæ‹‰å–é…ç½®ç”Ÿæˆçº¿ç¨‹æ± å¯¹è±¡æ”¾åˆ° Spring å®¹å™¨ä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ—¶ç›´æ¥ä» Spring å®¹å™¨ä¸­è·å–ï¼Œå¯¹ä¸šåŠ¡ä»£ç é›¶ä¾µå…¥ - **è½»é‡ç®€å•**ï¼šä½¿ç”¨èµ·æ¥æå…¶ç®€å•ï¼Œå¼•å…¥ç›¸åº”ä¾èµ–ï¼Œæ¥å…¥åªéœ€ç®€å• 4 æ­¥å°±å¯å®Œæˆï¼Œé¡ºåˆ© 3 åˆ†é’Ÿæå®šï¼Œç›¸å½“ä¸æ»‘ - **é€šçŸ¥å‘Šè­¦**ï¼šæä¾›å¤šç§é€šçŸ¥å‘Šè­¦ç»´åº¦ï¼ˆé…ç½®å˜æ›´é€šçŸ¥ã€æ´»æ€§æŠ¥è­¦ã€é˜Ÿåˆ—å®¹é‡é˜ˆå€¼æŠ¥è­¦ã€æ‹’ç»è§¦å‘æŠ¥è­¦ã€ä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œæˆ–ç­‰å¾…è¶…æ—¶æŠ¥è­¦ï¼‰ï¼Œè§¦å‘é…ç½®é˜ˆå€¼å®æ—¶æ¨é€å‘Šè­¦ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå·²æ”¯æŒä¼å¾®ã€é’‰é’‰ã€é£ä¹¦ã€é‚®ä»¶ã€äº‘ä¹‹å®¶æŠ¥è­¦ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æä¾› SPI æ¥å£å¯è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ‰©å±•å®ç° - **è¿è¡Œç›‘æ§**ï¼šå®šæ—¶é‡‡é›†çº¿ç¨‹æ± æŒ‡æ ‡æ•°æ®ï¼ˆ20 å¤šç§æŒ‡æ ‡ï¼ŒåŒ…å«çº¿ç¨‹æ± ç»´åº¦ã€é˜Ÿåˆ—ç»´åº¦ã€ä»»åŠ¡ç»´åº¦ã€tpsã€tpxx ç­‰ï¼‰ï¼Œæ”¯æŒé€šè¿‡ MicroMeterã€JsonLogã€JMX ä¸‰ç§æ–¹å¼å®šæ—¶è·å–ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ SpringBoot Endpoint ç«¯ç‚¹å®æ—¶è·å–æœ€æ–°æŒ‡æ ‡æ•°æ®ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æä¾› SPI æ¥å£å¯è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ‰©å±•å®ç° - **ä»»åŠ¡å¢å¼º**ï¼šæä¾›ä»»åŠ¡åŒ…è£…åŠŸèƒ½ï¼ˆæ¯” Spring çº¿ç¨‹æ± ä»»åŠ¡åŒ…è£…æ›´å¼ºå¤§ï¼‰ï¼Œå®ç° TaskWrapper æ¥å£å³å¯ï¼Œå¦‚ MdcTaskWrapperã€TtlTaskWrapperã€SwTraceTaskWrapperã€OpenTelemetryWrapperï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ”¯æŒçº¿ç¨‹æ± ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ä¿¡æ¯ä¼ é€’ - **å¤šé…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒæ”¯æŒ**ï¼šæ”¯æŒå¤šç§ä¸»æµé…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ Nacosã€Apolloã€Zookeeperã€Consulã€Etcdã€Polarisã€ServiceCombï¼ŒåŒæ—¶ä¹Ÿæä¾› SPI æ¥å£å¯è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ‰©å±•å®ç° - **ä¸­é—´ä»¶çº¿ç¨‹æ± ç®¡ç†**ï¼šé›†æˆç®¡ç†å¸¸ç”¨ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ç»„ä»¶çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ± ï¼Œå·²é›†æˆ Tomcatã€Jettyã€Undertowã€Dubboã€RocketMqã€Hystrixã€Grpcã€Motanã€Okhttp3ã€Brpcã€Tarsã€SofaRpcã€RabbitMqã€Liteflow ç­‰ç»„ä»¶çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ± ç®¡ç†ï¼ˆåŠ¨æ€è°ƒå‚ã€ç›‘æ§ã€æŠ¥è­¦ï¼‰ - **å¤šæ¨¡å¼**ï¼šæä¾›äº†å¢å¼ºçº¿ç¨‹æ±  DtpExecutorï¼ŒIO å¯†é›†å‹åœºæ™¯ä½¿ç”¨çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ±  EagerDtpExecutorï¼Œè°ƒåº¦çº¿ç¨‹æ±  ScheduledDtpExecutorï¼Œæœ‰åºçº¿ç¨‹æ±  OrderedDtpExecutorï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®ä¸šåŠ¡åœºæ™¯é€‰æ‹©åˆé€‚çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ±  - **å…¼å®¹æ€§**ï¼šJUC æ™®é€šçº¿ç¨‹æ± å’Œ Spring ä¸­çš„ ThreadPoolTaskExecutor ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è¢«æ¡†æ¶ç®¡ç†ï¼Œåªéœ€@Bean å®šä¹‰æ—¶åŠ  @DynamicTp æ³¨è§£å³å¯ - **å¯é æ€§**ï¼šä¾é  Spring ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸç®¡ç†ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åšåˆ°ä¼˜é›…å…³é—­çº¿ç¨‹æ± ï¼Œåœ¨ Spring å®¹å™¨å…³é—­å‰å°½å¯èƒ½å¤šçš„å¤„ç†é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­çš„ä»»åŠ¡ - **é«˜å¯æ‰©å±•**ï¼šæ¡†æ¶æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½éƒ½æä¾› SPI æ¥å£ä¾›ç”¨æˆ·è‡ªå®šä¹‰ä¸ªæ€§åŒ–å®ç°ï¼ˆé…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒã€é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è§£æã€é€šçŸ¥å‘Šè­¦ã€ç›‘æ§æ•°æ®é‡‡é›†ã€ä»»åŠ¡åŒ…è£…ã€æ‹’ç»ç­–ç•¥ç­‰ç­‰ï¼‰ - **çº¿ä¸Šå¤§è§„æ¨¡åº”ç”¨**ï¼šå‚è€ƒ[ç¾å›¢çº¿ç¨‹æ± å®è·µ](https://tech.meituan.com/2020/04/02/java-pooling-pratice-in-meituan.html)ï¼Œç¾å›¢å†…éƒ¨å·²ç»æœ‰è¯¥ç†è®ºæˆç†Ÿçš„åº”ç”¨ç»éªŒ --- ## æ¶æ„è®¾è®¡ **æ¡†æ¶åŠŸèƒ½å¤§ä½“å¯ä»¥åˆ†ä¸ºä»¥ä¸‹å‡ ä¸ªæ¨¡å—** > 1. é…ç½®å˜æ›´ç›‘å¬æ¨¡å— > > 2. çº¿ç¨‹æ± ç®¡ç†æ¨¡å— > > 3. ç›‘æ§æ¨¡å— > > 4. é€šçŸ¥å‘Šè­¦æ¨¡å— > > 5. ä¸‰æ–¹ç»„ä»¶çº¿ç¨‹æ± ç®¡ç†æ¨¡å— ![æŠ€æœ¯æ¶æ„](resources/img/arch.svg) è¯¦ç»†æŸ¥çœ‹å®˜ç½‘æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œ[æ¶æ„è®¾è®¡](https://dynamictp.cn/guide/introduction/architecture.html) --- ## æ¥å…¥æ­¥éª¤ > 1. å¼•å…¥ç›¸åº”é…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒçš„ä¾èµ–ï¼Œå…·ä½“è§å®˜ç½‘æ–‡æ¡£ > > 2. é…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒé…ç½®çº¿ç¨‹æ± å®ä¾‹ï¼Œé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è§å®˜ç½‘æ–‡æ¡£ > > 3. å¯åŠ¨ç±»åŠ  @EnableDynamicTp æ³¨è§£ > > 4. ä½¿ç”¨ @Resource æˆ– @Autowired è¿›è¡Œä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥ï¼Œæˆ–é€šè¿‡ DtpRegistry.getExecutor("name") è·å– > > 5. é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸Š 4 æ­¥å°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨äº†ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯æ„Ÿè§‰è¶…çº§ç®€å•å‘€ æ›´è¯¦ç»†ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹è¯·å‚è€ƒ `example` å·¥ç¨‹åŠ[å®˜ç½‘æ–‡æ¡£](https://dynamictp.cn/guide/use/quick-start.html) --- ## é€šçŸ¥æŠ¥è­¦ - è§¦å‘æŠ¥è­¦é˜ˆå€¼ä¼šæ¨é€ç›¸åº”æŠ¥è­¦æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼ˆæ´»æ€§ã€å®¹é‡ã€æ‹’ç»ã€ä»»åŠ¡ç­‰å¾…è¶…æ—¶ã€ä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œè¶…æ—¶ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸”ä¼šé«˜äº®æ˜¾ç¤ºç›¸åº”å­—æ®µ - é…ç½®å˜æ›´ä¼šæ¨é€é€šçŸ¥æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œä¸”ä¼šé«˜äº®å˜æ›´çš„å­—æ®µ æ›´å¤šè§å®˜ç½‘æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œ[é€šçŸ¥æŠ¥è­¦](https://dynamictp.cn/guide/notice/alarm.html) --- ## ç›‘æ§ ![ç›‘æ§æ•°æ®1](resources/img/monitor1.jpg) ![ç›‘æ§æ•°æ®2](resources/img/monitor2.jpg) ![ç›‘æ§æ•°æ®3](resources/img/monitor3.jpg) ç›®å‰æ¡†æ¶æä¾›äº†å››ç§ç›‘æ§æ•°æ®é‡‡é›†æ–¹å¼ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ collectorTypes å±æ€§é…ç½®ç›‘æ§æŒ‡æ ‡é‡‡é›†ç±»å‹ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ Micrometer > 1. Loggingï¼šçº¿ç¨‹æ± æŒ‡æ ‡æ•°æ®ä¼šä»¥ Json æ ¼å¼è¾“å‡ºåˆ°æŒ‡å®šçš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶é‡Œ > > 2. Internal_loggingï¼šçº¿ç¨‹æ± æŒ‡æ ‡æ•°æ®ä¼šä»¥ Json æ ¼å¼è¾“å‡ºåˆ°é¡¹ç›®æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶é‡Œ > > 3. Micrometerï¼šé‡‡ç”¨ç›‘æ§é—¨é¢ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å¼•å…¥ç›¸å…³ Micrometer ä¾èµ–é‡‡é›†åˆ°ç›¸åº”çš„å­˜å‚¨å¹³å°é‡Œï¼ˆå¦‚ Prometheusï¼ŒInfluxDb...ï¼‰ > > 4. Endpointï¼šæš´éœ² Endpoint ç«¯ç‚¹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ http æ–¹å¼å®æ—¶è·å–æŒ‡æ ‡æ•°æ® æ›´å¤šè§å®˜ç½‘æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œ[ç›‘æ§](https://dynamictp.cn/guide/monitor/collect_types.html) --- ## Star History [![Star History Chart](https://api.star-history.com/svg?repos=dromara/dynamic-tp&type=Date)](https://star-history.com/#dromara/dynamic-tp&Date) --- ## ä»£ç æ‰˜ç®¡ - github: https://github.com/dromara/dynamic-tp - gitee: https://gitee.com/dromara/dynamic-tp - gitcode: https://gitcode.com/dromara/dynamic-tp --- ## è”ç³»æˆ‘ çœ‹åˆ°è¿™å„¿ï¼Œ**è¯·ç»™é¡¹ç›®ä¸€ä¸ª star**ï¼Œä½ çš„æ”¯æŒæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å‰è¿›çš„åŠ¨åŠ›ï¼ ä½¿ç”¨è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­æœ‰ä»»ä½•é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæˆ–è€…å¯¹é¡¹ç›®æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆæƒ³æ³•æˆ–è€…å»ºè®®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åŠ å…¥ç¤¾ç¾¤ï¼Œè·Ÿ 1500+ ç¾¤å‹ä¸€èµ·äº¤æµè®¨è®ºã€‚ å¾®ä¿¡ç¾¤å·²æ»¡ 200 äººï¼Œå¯ä»¥å…³æ³¨å¾®ä¿¡å…¬ä¼—å·ï¼ŒåŠ æˆ‘ä¸ªäººå¾®ä¿¡æ‹‰ç¾¤ï¼ˆå¤‡æ³¨ï¼šdynamic-tpï¼‰ã€‚ ![](resources/img/contact.jpg) ä¸ºäº†é¡¹ç›®æ›´å¥½çš„å‘å±•ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨æ­¤è¿›è¡Œç™»è®°ï¼Œ[ä½¿ç”¨ç™»è®°](https://dynamictp.cn/guide/other/users.html) --- ## å‹æƒ…é“¾æ¥ - [HertzBeat](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat) : æ˜“ç”¨å‹å¥½çš„å®æ—¶ç›‘æ§å‘Šè­¦ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ— éœ€Agentï¼Œå¼ºå¤§è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç›‘æ§èƒ½åŠ›. --- ## ç‰¹åˆ«èµåŠ© **JNPFä½ä»£ç å¼€å‘å¹³å°** --- ## é¸£è°¢ æ„Ÿè°¢ JetBrains å¯¹å¼€æºé¡¹ç›®çš„æ”¯æŒ

files.name: pom.xml
files.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>org.dromara.dynamictp</groupId>
    <artifactId>dynamic-tp-all</artifactId>
    <version>${revision}</version>
    <packaging>pom</packaging>

    <name>DynamicTp Project</name>
    <description>ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥è½»é‡çº§åŠ¨æ€çº¿ç¨‹æ± ï¼Œå†…ç½®ç›‘æ§å‘Šè­¦åŠŸèƒ½ï¼ŒåŸºäºä¸»æµé…ç½®ä¸­å¿ƒï¼ˆå·²æ”¯æŒNacosã€Apolloã€Zookeeperã€Consulã€Etcdã€Polarisï¼Œå¯é€šè¿‡SPIè‡ªå®šä¹‰å®ç°ï¼‰</description>
    <url>https://github.com/yanhom1314/dynamic-tp</url>

    <properties>
        <revision>1.1.9.1</revision>

        <maven.compiler.source>8</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>8</maven.compiler.target>

        <spring-boot.version>2.7.18</spring-boot.version>
        <spring-cloud.version>2021.0.8</spring-cloud.version>

        <guava.version>31.1-jre</guava.version>
        <commons-collections4.version>4.4</commons-collections4.version>

        <maven-flatten.version>1.3.0</maven-flatten.version>
        <maven-checkstyle-plugin.verion>3.1.0</maven-checkstyle-plugin.verion>
        <maven-compiler-plugin.version>3.8.1</maven-compiler-plugin.version>
        <maven-source-plugin.version>2.4</maven-source-plugin.version>
        <maven-javadoc-plugin.version>3.2.0</maven-javadoc-plugin.version>
        <maven-gpg-plugin.version>1.6</maven-gpg-plugin.version>
        <nexus-staging-maven-plugin.version>1.6.7</nexus-staging-maven-plugin.version>
        <maven-site-plugin.version>3.7.1</maven-site-plugin.version>
        <maven-checkstyle-plugin.version>3.1.0</maven-checkstyle-plugin.version>

        <cglib.version>3.3.0</cglib.version>
    </properties>

    <modules>
        <module>adapter</module>
        <module>core</module>
        <module>common</module>
        <module>starter</module>
        <module>logging</module>
        <module>example</module>
        <module>extension</module>
        <module>jvmti</module>
        <module>test</module>
        <module>dependencies</module>
        <module>spring</module>
    </modules>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
            <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>commons-codec</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-codec</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.guava</groupId>
            <artifactId>guava</artifactId>
            <version>${guava.version}</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-collections4</artifactId>
            <version>${commons-collections4.version}</version>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <dependencyManagement>
        <dependencies>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-dependencies</artifactId>
                <version>${spring-boot.version}</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.springframework.cloud</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-cloud-dependencies</artifactId>
                <version>${spring-cloud.version}</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.dromara.dynamictp</groupId>
                <artifactId>dynamic-tp-dependencies</artifactId>
                <version>${project.version}</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>cglib</groupId>
                <artifactId>cglib</artifactId>
                <version>${cglib.version}</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>
        </dependencies>
    </dependencyManagement>

    <licenses>
        <license>
            <name>The Apache Software License, Version 2.0</name>
            <url>http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt</url>
            <distribution>repo</distribution>
        </license>
    </licenses>

    <scm>
        <url>https://github.com/yanhom1314/dynamic-tp/tree/master</url>
        <connection>scm:git:git://github.com/yanhom1314/dynamic-tp.git</connection>
        <developerConnection>scm:git:ssh://github.com:yanhom1314/dynamic-tp.git</developerConnection>
        <tag>HEAD</tag>
    </scm>

    <developers>
        <developer>
            <id>yanhom</id>
            <name>yanhom</name>
            <email>yanhom1314@gmail.com</email>
            <url>https://github.com/yanhom1314</url>
        </developer>
    </developers>

    <issueManagement>
        <system>Github Issue</system>
        <url>https://github.com/yanhom1314/dynamic-tp/issues</url>
    </issueManagement>

    <distributionManagement>
        <snapshotRepository>
            <id>ossrh</id>
            <url>https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots/</url>
        </snapshotRepository>
        <repository>
            <id>ossrh</id>
            <url>https://oss.sonatype.org/service/local/staging/deploy/maven2/</url>
        </repository>
    </distributionManagement>

    <build>
        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <!-- å…¬å…±checkstyleæ ‡å‡†é…ç½®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨å­æ¨¡å—ä¸­è¦†ç›–ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹è‡ªå®šä¹‰é€‰é¡¹ -->
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-checkstyle-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${maven-checkstyle-plugin.verion}</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <configLocation>.github/checkstyle/checkstyle.xml</configLocation>
                        <includeTestSourceDirectory>false</includeTestSourceDirectory>
                        <consoleOutput>true</consoleOutput>
                        <encoding>UTF-8</encoding>
                        <skip>false</skip>
                        <!--è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯è¯´å½“å‰è¿™ä¸ªé…ç½®æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆé”™è¯¯çº§åˆ«ã€‚å¦‚æœé…ç½®çš„æ˜¯errorï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæ‰«æåˆ°ä¸ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶çš„ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯æ‰“å°errorã€‚checkstyleé‡Œå…è®¸çš„é”™è¯¯çº§åˆ«æœ‰error, warning, info. -->
                        <violationSeverity>error</violationSeverity>
                        <!-- æ˜¯å¦æ‰“æ–­å‘½ä»¤æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œé”™è¯¯çš„æ—¶å€™ä¼šåœæ­¢ã€‚å¦åˆ™ï¼Œé”™è¯¯ä¼šç”ŸæˆæŠ¥å‘Šï¼Œä½†ä¸ä¼šé˜»æ­¢å‘½ä»¤æ‰§è¡Œã€‚ -->
                        <failsOnError>false</failsOnError>
                    </configuration>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>validate</id>
                            <phase>validate</phase>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>checkstyle</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>

        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>${maven-compiler-plugin.version}</version>
                <configuration>
                    <encoding>UTF-8</encoding>
                    <source>${maven.compiler.source}</source>
                    <target>${maven.compiler.target}</target>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>${maven-source-plugin.version}</version>
                <configuration>
                    <attach>true</attach>
                </configuration>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <phase>package</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>jar-no-fork</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>${maven-javadoc-plugin.version}</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>package</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>jar</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
                <configuration>
                    <archive>
                        <manifestEntries>
                            <Implementation-Title>${project.artifactId}</Implementation-Title>
                            <Implementation-Version>${project.version}</Implementation-Version>
                            <Build-Time>${maven.build.timestamp}</Build-Time>
                            <Built-By>yanhom</Built-By>
                        </manifestEntries>
                    </archive>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <!-- Gpg Signature -->
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-gpg-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>1.6</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <phase>verify</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>sign</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.sonatype.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>nexus-staging-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>1.6.7</version>
                <extensions>true</extensions>
                <configuration>
                    <serverId>ossrh</serverId>
                    <nexusUrl>https://oss.sonatype.org/</nexusUrl>
                    <autoReleaseAfterClose>false</autoReleaseAfterClose>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <!--æ‰€æœ‰å­æ¨¡å—éƒ½è¦æ‰§è¡Œçš„plugin-->
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-checkstyle-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-site-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>${maven-site-plugin.version}</version>
            </plugin>

            <!-- flatten -->
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
                <artifactId>flatten-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>${maven-flatten.version}</version>
                <configuration>
                    <updatePomFile>true</updatePomFile>
                    <flattenMode>resolveCiFriendliesOnly</flattenMode>
                </configuration>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>flatten</id>
                        <phase>process-resources</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>flatten</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                    <execution>
                        <id>flatten.clean</id>
                        <phase>clean</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>clean</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

    <reporting>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-checkstyle-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>${maven-checkstyle-plugin.version}</version>
                <reportSets>
                    <reportSet>
                        <reports>
                            <report>checkstyle</report>
                        </reports>
                    </reportSet>
                </reportSets>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </reporting>
</project>
